page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES IN WETHERBY
page.content: { Tick ball}is a game played between several people. One person has to stand with the ball and the other people have to run around. The person with the ball throws it and tries to hit someone. If you hit someone, that person is{on}with you. When every person has been hit with the ball, the first person who was hit by the ball is {on}in the next game. You play in this way until every single person has been{on. {BLACK PUDDING} First you go somewhere where there is a wall or a window. Then the person who is{on}faces the wall. The other people try to walk up to that person. But if the person turns around and sees someone move he or she has to go back to the beginning again. The players have to{tig}the person and say {"black pudding".
